thread.title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
thread.title_full: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K

author: BRIAN MAHONEY AP Basketball Writer
title: Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K
text:
Close Julie Jacobson 
FILE - In this July 22, 2013, file photo, USA Basketball men's national team coach Mike Krzyzewski is shown at practice in Las Vegas. Gregg Popovich, who has led the San Antonio Spurs to five NBA titles, will replace Mike Krzyzewski as the U.S. basketball coach following the 2016 Olympics. (AP Photo/Julie Jacobson, File) AP Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K Popovich to coach US Olympic basketball team after Coach K By BRIAN MAHONEY AP Basketball Writer Updated
